At the same time, it is becoming increasingly clear, in our increasingly-interconnected science and technology-oriented planet, that '''‘Scientific-Wisdom’''' is the next logical and required step in the DIKW-based scientific learning pathway: Moreover, ‘Scientific-Wisdom’ is becoming increasingly recognized as representing a refined and more-valuable level of scientific understanding.
